attributes.action: Will the government explain how it will measure the no alcohol limit imposed on new drivers if it comes into enforcement?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Will the government explain how it will measure the no alcohol limit imposed on new drivers if it comes into enforcement? The human body has naturally occurring alcohol within the blood stream. Therefore there cannot be a no alcohol limit imposed, therefore how small would the breath alcohol limit be and how will it be tested on the road not to give bad fail readings?
